films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden cult led by the evil Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Time Chasers
films.description: An inventor builds a time machine using a computer and a plane, only to find his actions have grave consequences.

films.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
films.description: Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

films.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
films.description: Aliens resurrect the dead to stop humans from creating a doomsday weapon that could destroy the universe.
